amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 118-298 to reduce the threshold value at which gifts must be reported from $50,000 to $1.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the threshold value at which gifts must be reported from $50,000 to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 94 - 320 (Roll no. 699).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 94 - 320 (Roll no. 699).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
